channel.title: Help
channel.description:
I'm not sure how to approach training range. My range level is 1. :P
Here are my other stats if it helps: 60 attack 95 strength 30 defence 70 HP 37 prayer 35 magic
I plan on getting 50 range with a dwarf cannon.
So the question is: How do I get from 50-99?
SW botting? Or what?

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“JaydenD12, post:17, topic:364092”][quote author=Lin link=topic=460326.msg3370567#msg3370567 date=1287199133]
Do it the old fashioned way and train yourself. Where’s the fun in getting 99 range if you didn’t even do anything to earn it? The game has already become extremely easy, and if it’s not good enough for you, then you’re a super lazy fuck.
[/quote]

Hes Asian, what do you expect?[/quote]
duh yeah

Read full topic

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @ChaosPkers ChaosPkers
item.description:
@ChaosPkers wrote:

[quote=“whip of soulz, post:13, topic:364092”][quote author=pure2ownage link=topic=460326.msg3370247#msg3370247 date=1287180168]

[quote author=whip of soulz link=topic=460326.msg3370149#msg3370149 date=1287173197]

Thanks. I might just SW it. Might start at level 50ish.

Don’t forget that getting a 99 skill completely off of Soul Wars will not level your hitpoints.

Yeah, I’m gonna SW HP too.

Thanks for other suggestions, but every time I compile a script, I get like 60 errors. Every script.

Why would you bot SW, yet spend Zeal on HP…? The point of SW is not that it gets large amounts of EXP (65k-100k a night, 250-400k a night fighting monsters), but that it doesn’t get HP levels.

I suggest not wasting Zeal on HP.
[/quote]He should get 99 str on the monsters/players at sw and spend zealz on da range prayer to save 999999m and become a turmoil pure

Now your idea is win.
[/quote]Ooooo yah turmiol r leilk da bast ting eder[/quote]trolling went out of style a while ago

Read full topic

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

Yeah, idk if you’re trolling or not but you can hit 500s with a whip + turmoil without a potion, image slayer helm + task + super str / atk + turmoil + soulsplit [to heal]
win lol

Read full topic

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

Personally, this is how I would do it:

1-30: Minotaurs in the Stronghold of Security.

30: Get Ava’s Attractor.

30-50: Experiments.

50: Get Ava’s Accumulator.

50-60: Rock Crabs,Experiments, or Pest Control.

60-70: TzHaar-Xils.

70-90: Any TzHaar creature or Green Dragons.

90-99: TzHaar, Green Dragons, Blue Dragons, Soul Wars, Pest Control, or Chinchompas.

This is how I’d go. I got to 90 this way, and hopefully my friend will follow

Read full topic

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“Chassy13, post:4, topic:364092”]50-99:

51-90+ = Slayer and or camping the TzHaar caves.

90+ = Chinchompas.

Of course you can run a bot, but the above is what most people do.[/quote]
Thanks. I might just SW it. Might start at level 50ish.

Read full topic

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

50-99:

51-90+ = Slayer and or camping the TzHaar caves.

90+ = Chinchompas.

Of course you can run a bot, but the above is what most people do.

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

Well, it’s a pain to train from level 1-40 range with normal arrows, so I’m using dwarf cannon atm. 25 range in 8 mins, not too bad.

Read full topic

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

Only bot Soul wars (or anything for that matter) with a PAID for bot. Such as Autofighter.org.

Only bot 4-5 times a week.

And start soul warring at 75+.

To train from there, get an ava attractor and go to experiments (priest in peril/start of creature of Frankenstein). Dwarf cannon = total waste of money. Soul wars in later level keeps you from doing that. Since you only get like 10k of range exp anyhow, from what 300-400k worth of balls, and like 3 hours of work?

Offtopic: Nice strength level.

Read full topic
